H0.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Fauvism

H1.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Expressionism

H2.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Cubism

H3.text: what style of art did henri matisse do. Impressionism

A4.text: Matisse abandoned his earth-colored palette for bright Impressionist colors

A5.text: The leaders of the movement were André Derain and Henri Matisse

A6.text: The intense colourism of the works he painted between 1900 and 1905 brought him notoriety as one of the Fauves (French for 'wild beasts').

A7.text: In that year, he painted the most important of his works in the neo-Impressionist style, Luxe, Calme et Volupté.

A8.text: The Wild Men of Paris, Matisse, Picasso and Les Fauves
